author: ryanleeschneider
content: How would one usually go about generating the access list for an EIP-2930 tx?  My guess is you'd want to trace the tx once to see what storage keys it reads, then estimate gas on it with an access list from those keys and see if it comes out cheaper?

author: sky.cactus
content: Really 2930 is just there as a way to do targeted fixes for broken contracts.  I don't think anyone expects it to be used generally at this point.

author: sky.cactus
content: But yeah, running a local trace is how I would do it, or manually construct it.

author: holiman
